website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy U lock and bike cable that enable you to easily lock and leave your bike without worrying.
pros: Sturdy steel construction that resists cutting
Suitable for use on bikes of all sizes
Easy to use once it's set up
cons: There have been a few complaints about the durability of the mounting bracket

customer_reviews.title: Not A Series 2!
customer_reviews.text: I received the product, and proceeded to register the keys at Kryptonite website. The key number has a prefix of "P". I selected the product name "KryptoLok Series 2 Standard with 4 Ft Cable", the website asked me to pick the key prefix, but none of the 3 choices is letter P. So I suspected that it is not a Series 2. Once I made the selection of product name to just "KryptoLok", the key prefix choice changed to letter P. I'm sure that this lock will function for some time, but I have to give 1 star due to false product name here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Pandamania

customer_reviews.title: These are a thief deterrent not and actual fix
customer_reviews.text: alot of people giving this product a 1 star i dont think you fully understand what a lock is, a lock is something just to deter the thief its not a actual solution you can break absolutely any lock so stop giving it 1 star when your bike gets stolen
customer_reviews.author: Johan Polanco

customer_reviews.title: The commuter lock!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock for my daily commuter ride, which is an 80s Fuji S12. My ride isn't super costly, but I have tricked it out and want to keep it as safe as possible on my daily commute. I leave my bike locked up on a campus area that is well traveled and thus far the lock has done its job! I will say the mount that comes with it is a little cheap, but it works. Overall I am pretty happy with my purchase and would recommend this lock to anyone who is commuting daily and locking their bike up in an are that is well lit and traversed daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good if only it didn't fail
customer_reviews.text: This is medium rated compared to other Kryptonite locks. But it is heavy and solid. The cable is essential for locking to a fixed object or between two locks, one on each wheel. It worked well for about 3 weeks, and then it failed. The key would not turn, and the lock would not lock. Fortunately for me, it did not fail when it was attached to my bike. So I've returned it but for a replacement of the same lock. I'm hoping the first was just an aberration.
customer_reviews.author: David Bruck

customer_reviews.title: It sucks in a huge way
customer_reviews.text: Screw this piece of garbage!! Theives cut right through it like a knife in butter and stole my brand new bike. What a piece of crap. Don't bother with this.
customer_reviews.author: Ro K.

customer_reviews.title: MY KRYPTONITE, MY HERO.
customer_reviews.text: SAVED MY BIKE. BROKE THE ASSAILANTS CAR JACK. STILL WORKS. HALLELUJAH! 🙏😭 RIP to my dear, brave, cord who died in battle- your sacrifice will not be forgotten. ❤ *I've only left my bike outside one time in the 2 years I've owned it, to you, the reader-despite my success story, I warn you: Don't put faith in your neighborhood. Not even once.*
customer_reviews.author: Andale

customer_reviews.title: Saved my bike from theft
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Someone tried to steal my bike and failed
customer_reviews.author: Marc Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike Lock
customer_reviews.text: I live in a nice area and keep my bike in my garage. So I'm not exactly in a lot of high risk places. But I use this lock when my bike is on my rook rack and also when I went on vacation. No one stole my bike so I guess it's working. The locking mechanism is smooth. Haven't dealt with any jamming yet. I was on the beach with it and the sand didn't seem to bother it. I feel I have peace of mind using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Armistead

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: It provides security, but the Kryptonite Guarantee only applies to the lock and not the included cable. I use the bike for work and school, which has a lot of foot traffic. I feel comfortable using the lock, but use the cable to secure the wheels and seat. The keys that come with lock, are on the flimsy side, easy to bend if not properly seated in the lock.
customer_reviews.author: S Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for fat tire bike (26 x 4)
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't lock my fat tire bike (26 x 4 - rear tire) and frame to the bike rack, it's not long and/or wide enough for that, so I had to return it. However you can use it to lock your fat tire bike in these situations: 1) Bike rack and rear tire, 2) rear tire and frame, 3) frame and bike rack, or 4) only tire. The cable has sufficient length to connect both front and rear tires. Key is working fine and turn fine in the lock. Overall, good product, just didn't meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Shabby

customer_reviews.title: Can't register Key Safe program - KEY NUMBER DOES NOT MATCH LOCK MODEL SELECTED.
customer_reviews.text: I just bound 2nd one of this exact model "KryptoLok Mini-7 U-Lock with 4" Flex" for my kids. The lock comes with 2 keys. I have never thought about to register in Key Safe program till kids lost 1st key. I try to register the key with model # & key #, but kept receiving "KEY NUMBER DOES NOT MATCH LOCK MODEL SELECTED". I have tried all KryptoLok Mini-7 U-Lock models and none of them works. Can you identify model by the Key number? Help, please,
customer_reviews.author: W. Sieh

customer_reviews.title: Feel safe now
customer_reviews.text: This locker has a reputation. I struggle a little with the wire (where to put it?) and the installation was not so easy. In revenge, it offers a lot of versatility. One thing bugs me sometimes : the rubber rings a the ends of the U form tends to out when I unlock and the next lock is sometimes difficult because you must reposition the rings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No keys!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this highly rated lock in a timely manner. My daughter needed if for school. The package has a sticker that says "Inspected by Amazon." But there were NO KEYS!! Completely useless. The inspection sticker means nothing because obviously no looked at it. Also, the package appears to have been opened at some point. Now I have to ship it back and go buy a new on. Very disappointed in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WIDE LOCK
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice wide, 5x9. Most other locks come come smaller so it can be difficult getting getting the wheel, frame and object you're locking to, with this one it's no issue at all. It's a shame they don't make this size lock in a higher lock rating though, this is the next best thing though and I'm content with it.
customer_reviews.author: Aceman

customer_reviews.title: Beyond frustrating & a complete waste of time
customer_reviews.text: The brand new lock won't open with the keys fully going in & turning 180. The ant-theft registration won't work as the model / key number combination isn't recognized by the website. If Kryptonite truly wants this to be a smooth experience for the customers, they can just ask us to enter the key number, rather than trying to guess the model family, model, key prefix, and only to find the key number doesn't match lock model. I might need to take this to a bike shop only for the lock to work, and still risk riding my bike around without the advertised anti-theft insurance. Will be returning this. Horrible experience - such a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The lock is worth the money, but the mounting system is not explained well!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a heavy-duty lock! The included mounting instructions for the lock to your bike are not clear. It didn't matter because the lock is to big to mount in the same area as my water bottle cage. I can't mount both inside the triangular space of my frame. The included cable is not worth lugging around since it's thinner than the one I had before as my main lock, which got cut by bolt cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $60, but got it on sale...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, very good. Takes a little adjusting and the keys wouldn’t work at first. It’s surprisingly difficult to check the quality at a glance, so we shall see how it goes. The holder installation is deceptively easy. The instructions are a little convoluted.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L. Upshaw

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: No matter how tight I attached the mount for the lock, it rattles.... After a few hours of riding around it starts to get loose and move. It is a bit difficult to remove the bar part of the u lock. Overall it looks secure but I wouldn't trust it. This might be a fake due to the quality. You can get better quality at target.
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike Lock
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lock and works fine. Kinda heavy, but well worth it. Bought a cheaper cable type lock. They cut it and stole my 2 X $100 bikes. That will not happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up well
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months the key is getting hard to turn. It needs to be rattled in the shackle repeatedly open or close.
customer_reviews.author: Decker Bros

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile security lock
customer_reviews.text: Great lock by the register key process is very unfriendly and there's no way to contact customer service
customer_reviews.author: KAMM

customer_reviews.title: Lock is jammed on arrival common problem
customer_reviews.text: This lock does not work. Turn key and it doesn’t release all the way. Looked up the problem online and it seems everyone is having the same problem, suggesting I buy a Teflon lubricant to unjam my brand new lock. Now I have to drive to Kohl’s and wait on line to return, I was hoping to ride my bike today instead!!! Do not buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Colin

customer_reviews.title: If you want a bike lock that locks when you want it to lock, then do NOT buy this lock.
customer_reviews.text: FAILED while I was trying to lock my bike at the train station. Missed my train. Had to ride back home and walk to the train station. Late for work. Diagnosis: plastic cover on "U" migrated to one end, blocking entry to lock. Possible fix: trim plastic. Problem: could keep happening. Possible fix: remove the plastic cover on "U." Problem: Might damage the paint on the bike; might rust, might void warranty.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: kryptonite u bolt mount is crap.
customer_reviews.text: kryptonite U-BOLT is total junk. cannot properly mount bolt onto frame using supplied tool/nylon strap. dont waste your time or money, even after watching the youtube video i still could not properly mount this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Smash

customer_reviews.title: Broke nearly right away
customer_reviews.text: It broke within a week and would not lock again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks impressive
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is going to dissuade a determined thief, but this will make everyone else think twice.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these and they are exactly what I wanted. It was also cheaper than purchasing at our local bike shop.
customer_reviews.author: PamRodTX

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, wider span helps for locking up in Manhattan
customer_reviews.text: Working fine here in Manhattan. Gets a good amount of use daily. Always have to look for signs and other posts to lock up to. The wider size of this lock gives me more options. Decent price too.
customer_reviews.author: StereoMic

customer_reviews.title: Super Strong, Super Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Super strong sturdy lock. Extremely heavy and cumbersome. Almost more than you need, unless you're locking your bike up in a rough neighborhood overnight. I returned it for something more manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: a complete piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: the lock is new and will not open with the key. The hardware that attaches the lock to the pick would not release the lock. A complete waste of time and piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Crap cable
customer_reviews.text: Cheap cable just like the ones the theives cut through....sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Saundra Noble

customer_reviews.title: Great product for bicycle.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty damn good lock, just avoid sketchy areas and you all good.
customer_reviews.author: DeftonesDexy

customer_reviews.title: Locks both wheels and gets around a post
customer_reviews.text: Very good lock and the cable connects front wheel and wraps around a post
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: I like the construction of the device and the ease with which I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: JohnA

customer_reviews.title: Often Gets Jammed and does not open
customer_reviews.text: This lock is sturdy and feels secure. Unfortunately, from time to time, the lock does not open even when the key is fully inserted and turned. This is extremely frustrating and takes a few minutes to get it unjammed. I am not sure if this is a manufacturing error but I will be seeking a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Gives the impression that you want to hang on to what you have. Like the cable, bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Frank L. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy and bulky for me
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy and bulky for me - could use it to chain down a tank - well not really but
customer_reviews.author: Constantine Vlahakis

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Goes through the wheels just perfect. Safety features are awesome. Does the job I need it to do,
customer_reviews.author: Minina

customer_reviews.title: My bikes are still with me, so I guess it works (for now)!
customer_reviews.text: My bikes are still with me, so I guess it works (for now)!
customer_reviews.author: Johns

customer_reviews.title: One of the best locks
customer_reviews.text: Great lock- a little heavy but to be expected if you want something secure!
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Tubman

customer_reviews.title: Sticky bike lock
customer_reviews.text: Look is good but has got stuck twice this week.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive for what it is but it’s a great lock, I’ve been happy with it. Because of my bike design I can’t mount it on my bike, it is a little heavy to carry in a backpack but not too big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M.

customer_reviews.title: One minor issue.
customer_reviews.text: Great lock and cable. The mechanics and key are bit of a struggle at times. Which is my only reason for taking away a star.

customer_reviews.title: The key is very sticky and often won't turn all ...
customer_reviews.text: The key is very sticky and often won't turn all the way around making it difficult to open/close the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Paulinski

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, bulletproof built, nice carry clip supplied with it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, built to last and scare away anybody attempting to break it... comes with holder which need to be fixed to the frame with a nylon strap, string and easy to attach, perfect for the lock and cable!!
customer_reviews.author: Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Key doesn't always work...
customer_reviews.text: Key doesn't work well. I often look like I'm trying to STEAL MY OWN BIKE as it takes several attempts for the key to work. It gets worse during the winter months in my city, the thing would simply NOT work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap. Broke within 3 months of using it
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Broke within 3 months of using it, which wasn't that often. I locked/unlocked it maybe 20 times. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Huber

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate. No u-lock
customer_reviews.text: This item does not contain what it says AT ALL. There was no u-lock. The cable was not krptonite brand. I’m so pissed right now.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rupe

customer_reviews.title: Tricky but totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: The lock makes me feel extremely secure, but does add about 6 min to my commute for locking and unlocking. It can be tricky to close, so tricky that I often throw it into my backpack in pieces to save time. Despite this - It gives me an extreme level of peace of mind in the middle of downtown Denver where I leave it locked for 8-10 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bikes still stolen
customer_reviews.text: My bikes were still stolen even though I locked them up outside my apartment correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the new design and think it's much better than the older style. Keeps my bike safe!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Arlington

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock
customer_reviews.text: Don't rely on the cable to secure your bike though. That's how my last one got stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn M.

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: double barrel lock. its to keep honest people honest. use the cable to secure tire and seat then back through the lock see you tube for videos
customer_reviews.author: John finn

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: The only brand I'll trust in the city. Have the locking spikes in my wheels, so only use this for the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Crouse

customer_reviews.title: Good lock, Makes too much noise!
customer_reviews.text: The lock function and security is great. When riding however the bike lock is not designed sturdy enough and makes too much noise clinging against the two pieces. Would avoid this lock until a new design is implemented.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Standard with small cable
customer_reviews.text: I bought standard, but the cable is jus for one wheel, if you want for both wheels you should buy one long cable a part. I didn’t like about this, because when say standard should be all pack. Meanwhile is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Gilmara Santos

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for fair price
customer_reviews.text: Good lock, its party safe for regular use in office or shops for not that long , worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Zair R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality - great present for a bike rider in your life.
customer_reviews.author: KMG 456

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to any bike rider
customer_reviews.text: I really like the lock with the key but had to order a new cord. The cord was not long enough to go through both tires and wrap around the lock. But still a great lock, haven’t had any problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Simmons

customer_reviews.title: I bought this precut in March 16, 2018 and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this precut in March 16, 2018 and the product is already rusted. Please send me a replacement. This is very expensive to last less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Isa V.

customer_reviews.title: Good Lock
customer_reviews.text: Reliable and fast delivery, just in time for outdoor cycles. A little heavy but all for security.
customer_reviews.author: coyfox

customer_reviews.title: Decent lock
customer_reviews.text: Good lock but the key sticks a lot and is hard to turn.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Henriksen

customer_reviews.title: Great bike lock and very affordable!!
customer_reviews.text: If you want security and a product with a long standing history of reliability, then look no further! I’ve been using Kryptonite locks on bicycles since I was a young man and they’ve never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: T Kane

customer_reviews.title: Secure
customer_reviews.text: THE best security you can buy for your bike. Bolt cutters of no use to the thief.
customer_reviews.author: Long-Time Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cable was too weak.
customer_reviews.text: Totally useless. The cable was cut and bike was stolen after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Secures everything
customer_reviews.text: I just like the fact that it came with the cable. I have k wheels on my bike and being able to secure all of the parts to gather gives me a great sence of security.
customer_reviews.author: Irving K. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Mount not scooter friendly.
customer_reviews.text: The mount is not large enough to fit on the front of a Segway scooter Ninebot.
customer_reviews.author: CravenTech

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Feel Secure when I lock my bike use it daily for sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strap Isn't Secure
customer_reviews.text: The strap for this lock loosened while I was riding and fell off my bike stumbling down in the wilderness i was by!! Waste of money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Feels sturdy. Some might find it a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. The cable allows you to lock two bikes without having two individual locks.
customer_reviews.author: raymond

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Strap that holds it to my bike broke the first week. Has nice components but doesn’t seem to last in terms of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Secure
customer_reviews.text: Always stick to this brand for bike locks. They are tried and true!
customer_reviews.author: Kouts90

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind that’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. That’s really all you need to know about a bike lock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent lock, but difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: The U bar is too narrow to easily loop around rear wheel, frame and hitching post.
customer_reviews.author: CSM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy lock
customer_reviews.text: I use it for work to lock up my handtruck. It's strong enough that people can't clip the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Leo

customer_reviews.title: Security
customer_reviews.text: Very good lock second one I have bought. Cable also good
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Product Works
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, slick design - easy to carry, great for commuter options
customer_reviews.author: Evan Heiser

customer_reviews.title: This product does not work.
customer_reviews.text: The keys and the locker did not work. I do not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does what it does. Locks up your bike and keeps it safe
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Need to sruggle with the key to lock and unlock
customer_reviews.author: Tomer ronrn

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Only issue I have is I usually have ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only issue I have is I usually have a hard time locking it. For some reason it the key gets jammed quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Vita

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with part to put on bike
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn’t come with part to put it on the bike. I just got a new bike so went to put it on and that part is not there. Would like to receive that part and then I would change my review to 5 stars. I am past return window cause was slowly buying assecories so when I found bike I wanted I would have it all. Don’t have way to get in touch with outfit that sent it. So now have to carry in backpack everywhere I go
customer_reviews.author: april

product_meta.title: Kryptonite Kryptolok 12.7mm U-Lock with FlexFrame-U Bracket
feature_bullets: 12.7mm Hardended Performance Steel Shackle Resists Hand Tools, Bolt Cutters, and Leverage Attacks; 10mm Steel Looped Cable For Additional Security
Interior Locking Dimensions; 4" x 9" Cable Length; 4"
Key Safe Program; Kryptonite will ship your first 2 keys for free, globally, in the event you lose them.
Anti-Theft Protection Offer; Up to $1,750 Reimbursement
